keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin’s military modernization has the Pentagon responding by accelerating its own “undersea capabilities” and countermeasures.

headline.print_headline: Russia Expands Submarine Fleet as Rivalry Grows
headline.main: Russia Bolsters Its Submarine Fleet, and Tensions With U.S. Rise

snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin’s military modernization has the Pentagon responding by accelerating its own “undersea capabilities” and countermeasures.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin's government has invested billions of dollars in expanding and upgrading nation's fleet of nuclear- and diesel-powered attack submarines; expansion has led to more numerous Russian submarine patrols in North Atlantic and Mediterranean Sea, adding to tensions as rivalry with and military buildup between Russia and United States grows.
